It's definitely the focal point of my dining room! Michael Brown I can't say enough good things about TableShop. Their tables are not only beautiful but also durable. I've had mine for over a year now and it still looks as good as new. Thank you, TableShop! Connect with us I accept Privacy policy Frequently Asked Questions What materials are your tables made of? Our tables are crafted from a variety of high-quality materials, including solid wood, metal, and glass. Each material is carefully selected to ensure durability, functionality, and aesthetic appeal. Do you offer customization options? Yes, we offer customization options to suit your specific needs and preferences. Whether you're looking for a different size, finish, or design, our team will work closely with you to bring your vision to life. How do I care for my table? Proper care and maintenance are essential to prolonging the life of your table. We recommend using coasters to protect the surface from heat and moisture, and regularly cleaning with a mild detergent and soft cloth. pages.index: TableShop - Online Store of designer tables About us Gallery Contacts FAQs +91-134-6231275 tableshop@gmail.com Discover Exquisite Tables at TableShop India Elevate your dining experience with our exclusive collection of designer tables at TableShop India. Crafted with precision and elegance, our tables redefine luxury and style for your home. Explore Now Discover Our Rich Heritage Step into the world of TableShop India, where each table tells a story of tradition, innovation, and craftsmanship passed down through generations. Nestled in the bustling streets of India, our journey began decades ago with a humble vision: to create tables that not only serve as functional pieces of furniture but also as timeless works of art. Rooted in the rich tapestry of Indian culture, our designs draw inspiration from the vibrant colors, intricate patterns, and diverse landscapes that define this land. From the majestic Himalayas to the sun-kissed beaches of Goa, each table embodies the essence of India's eclectic charm. With a relentless pursuit of excellence, we collaborate with master craftsmen who skillfully transform raw materials into masterpieces of unparalleled beauty. Every curve, every detail is meticulously crafted to perfection, resulting in tables that exude elegance and sophistication. As we continue to push the boundaries of design innovation, our commitment to sustainability remains unwavering. We source our materials responsibly, ensuring that our tables not only enrich your home but also contribute to the preservation of our planet for future generations to enjoy. Join us on a journey of discovery as we invite you to experience the magic of TableShop India, where every table is a testament to our heritage, passion, and dedication to excellence. Explore Our Collection Explore Our Exquisite Collection. Discover a world of unparalleled craftsmanship and elegance with TableShop India's wide range of designer tables. From sleek modern designs to timeless classics, each piece in our collection is meticulously crafted to perfection, using only the finest materials and techniques. Discover TableShop Advantages Experience the TableShop difference. Elevate your space with our premium designer tables, meticulously crafted to blend functionality with elegance. From modern marvels to timeless classics, each piece in our collection is a testament to quality and innovation. Quality Craftsmanship At TableShop, we pride ourselves on delivering unparalleled quality in every piece. Our tables are crafted with precision and attention to detail, ensuring they not only enhance your space but also stand the test of time. Unique Designs Our design philosophy revolves around innovation and creativity. From contemporary chic to timeless classics, our diverse range of designs caters to every style and preference, allowing you to find the perfect table that reflects your unique taste. pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - TableShop - Online store of designer tables About us Gallery Contacts FAQs +91-134-6231275 tableshop@gmail.com Privacy Policy Introduction At our company, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our users. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the personal information you provide to us. By using our services, you agree to the terms and conditions set forth in this policy. Information Collection and Use We collect various types of information from our users, including personal information such as name, email address, and contact details. This information is necessary for us to provide you with our services and to improve your user experience. We may also collect non-personal information, such as usage data and device information, to help us better understand how our services are being used. We use the information we collect to fulfill your requests, process payments, communicate with you, and improve our services. We may also use your information for marketing purposes, such as sending you promotional materials or informing you about new products or services. However, we will always provide you with the option to opt-out of such communications. Data Sharing and Disclosure We may share your personal information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our services, such as payment processors or analytics providers. These third parties are bound by confidentiality agreements and are only permitted to use your information for the purposes of providing their services to us. We may also disclose your information if required to do so by law or in the good-faith belief that such action is necessary to comply with legal requirements or to protect the rights, property, or safety of our company, our users, or the public. Data Security We take the security of your personal information very seriously and have implemented various measures to protect it from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. These measures include encryption, access controls, and regular security audits. However, no method of data transmission or storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute safety of your information. Data Retention We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. When we no longer need your personal information, we will securely delete or destroy it. Your Rights and Choices You have the right to access, correct, or delete the personal information we have collected about you. You may also have the right to object to or restrict certain processing of your personal information. To exercise these rights, please contact us at tableshop@gmail.com. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website or by other means of communication. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at tableshop@gmail.com. pages.terms: Terms of Service - TableShop - Online store of designer tables About us Gallery Contacts FAQs +91-134-6231275 tableshop@gmail.com Terms of Use Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services. Use of Services Our services are provided for your personal, non-commercial use. You may not use our services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You are responsible for ensuring that your use of our services complies with all applicable laws and regulations. Intellectual Property All content and materials available on our services, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, are the property of our company or its licensors and are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content from our services without our prior written consent. Disclaimer of Warranties Our services are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no warranties or representations about the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of the content available on our services. We disclaim all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. Limitation of Liability Our company shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our services. In no event shall our total liability exceed the amount you have paid to us for the services in the past twelve months. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold harmless our company, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses arising out of your use of our services or your violation of these Terms of Use. Changes to Terms We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms of Use at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of our services after any changes indicates your acceptance of the updated terms. It is your responsibility to review these terms regularly. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms of Use, please contact us at tableshop@gmail.com. Home Contacts Privacy policy Terms of Use Crafting elegance, redefining spaces
